events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position with a detailed resume and portfolio.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on the candidate’s skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to manage the next steps of the hiring process for this candidate.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to evaluate the candidate’s motivation, communication skills, and basic technical knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the role and availability for technical interview scheduling.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week, providing both the candidate and interviewers with required details and preparation materials.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in the required programming languages.
An HR interview session has been arranged to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate’s long-term aspirations.
The HR interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on candidate’s fit for the team and organizational values.
A formal offer has been proposed including salary, benefits, and start date, sent to the candidate with an invitation to respond.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested a few clarifications about remote working policies.
The candidate has officially accepted the job offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process has started with equipment delivery and access granted to internal systems ahead of the candidate’s first day.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and the position is now formally filled by the new software engineer.
